pr_title: Refactor the client cache to use string file id

timeline.message: refactor the client cache to use string file id
fix read small page and add test

timeline.author: calvinjia

timeline.bodyText: Is it intentional to reverse the key order?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: yeah, it is easier to read the rest of the buffer as string when we decode the page id from byte array.
replies.author: bf8086

timeline.bodyText: Do you know how much more expensive this is compared to getLong?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: Probably a lot more expensive. Not sure how much it impact the overall performance though.
replies.author: bf8086

replies.bodyText: yeah something we can keep in mind if performance is an issue
replies.author: calvinjia
